page.topic: UX and Grid Component - Javascript Actions - Filter List
page.description: The Define Javascript Action dialog now has a filter control to allow you to easily filter the list of actions. This is useful because some developers now have a large number of Javascript Actions defined in their components.

section.title: a5_json_viewer() Function
section.description: The A5_json_viewer() function can be used to open a viewer for JSON data.
